com.std.view

Class CalendarView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.std.view.CalendarView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class CalendarView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This is the main entry point for the view, it updates the views when it is called by the controller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This method updates the different views when an event is called from the model it passes the subset of the total set of appointments by calling get range, it also passes the selected appointment and the selected date to the views

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Set<RefAppointment> refSet,
          java.util.Date selectedDate,
          RefAppointment selectedAppointment,
          java.io.File currentFile)
        This method updates the different views when an event is called from the model it passes the subset of the total set of appointments by calling get range, it also passes the selected appointment and the selected date to the views
        Parameters:
        refSet - the total set of refrence appointments
        selectedDate - the currently selected Date
        selectedAppointment - the currently selected Appointment
        currentFile - the current file
